meta.title: Numize - AI-Native Analytics Platform
meta.description: AI-native analytics workflow: from question to insight to action, governed by data teams and powered by semantic slices. Business teams gain autonomy without sacrificing governance.

hero.headline: From question to insight to action
hero.subheadline: Numize enables business teams to access, understand, and act on their data without depending on analysts — while ensuring full governance and trust for the Data Team.

coreFeatures.sectionTitle: Three powerful features for autonomous analytics
coreFeatures.sectionDescription: Everything you need to go from question to insight to action, governed by your data team.

converseAndAct.title: Converse & Act
converseAndAct.tagline: Ask anything, understand everything, take action instantly
converseAndAct.description: Natural-language analytics with deep investigation mode and instant action execution via MCP servers.

features.naturalLanguage: Ask questions in plain English and get SQL-backed answers
features.deepDive: Deep investigation mode to understand anomalies and patterns
features.actions: Execute actions via MCP servers (Brevo, HubSpot, Salesforce, Slack, Notion)
features.segments: Create reusable segments and save action templates

weeklyDigest.title: Weekly Digest
weeklyDigest.tagline: Your AI-generated Monday report. Structured, explainable, interactive
weeklyDigest.description: Configurable recurring insights with anomaly detection, explanation, and interactive deep-dive capabilities.

features.blocks: Configurable blocks (KPIs, anomalies, funnels, product usage)
features.anomalies: Automatic anomaly detection with confidence scores and explanations
features.splitScreen: Split-screen mode with integrated chat for deep dives
features.recurrence: Daily, weekly, or monthly delivery to email or in-app

semanticExposure.title: Semantic Exposure
semanticExposure.tagline: The Data Team defines the governed data that business teams can safely use
semanticExposure.description: Full governance and auditability with dbt integration, allowing data teams to expose semantic slices to business users.

features.slices: Semantic slice management per team (Marketing, Product, Ops)
features.dbt: Deep dbt integration with manifest sync and lineage tracking
features.governance: Full auditability, review workflow for AI-generated assets
features.sources: Data source configuration with privacy and scoping rules

personas.sectionTitle: Built for every role in your data ecosystem
personas.sectionDescription: From decision makers to power users to data governance, Numize serves all three core personas.

headOfX.title: Head of X
headOfX.subtitle: Marketing, Product, Ops
headOfX.description: Strategic understanding with autonomy and speed. Get weekly insights, anomaly explanations, and take actions directly.

benefits.autonomy: Ask anything without waiting for analysts
benefits.proactive: Receive proactive weekly insights with explanations
benefits.action: Take action instantly via integrated connectors
benefits.speed: Get answers in minutes, not days

businessOps.title: Business Ops
businessOps.subtitle: Growth Ops, Product Ops, Revenue Ops
businessOps.description: Execute deep investigations, produce segments, and run advanced analysis with the ability to automate activation workflows.

benefits.investigations: Deep-dive into anomalies and complex patterns
benefits.analysis: Run advanced cohort and funnel analysis

dataTeam.title: Data Team
dataTeam.subtitle: Analytics Engineers, Data Engineers
dataTeam.description: Own the dbt project and semantic layer. Provide governed semantic access with strict auditability and control.

benefits.governance: Full control over what data business teams can access
benefits.dbt: Deep integration with your existing dbt project
benefits.auditability: Complete audit trail of all queries and actions
benefits.quality: Review and correct AI-generated SQL and segments

deepDive.headline: Governed analytics workflow in three steps
deepDive.description: Your data team exposes semantic slices, business teams ask questions and take action, all while maintaining full governance and auditability.

features.connect: Data team configures semantic slices and data sources
features.ask: Business teams ask questions in natural language
features.visualize: AI generates SQL from governed semantic layer
features.share: Deep-dive into insights with investigation mode
features.export: Execute actions via MCP connectors (Brevo, HubSpot, Slack)

sarah.quote: Numize gives our business teams the autonomy they need while giving us the governance we require. The dbt integration means we maintain full control over the semantic layer.
sarah.author: Sarah Chen

marcus.quote: I can ask 'Why did conversion drop in Italy?' and get a deep investigation with probable causes in seconds. Then I create a segment and push it to Brevo — all without bothering the data team.
marcus.author: Marcus Rodriguez

emily.quote: The Weekly Digest is a game-changer. Every Monday I get proactive insights with anomaly detection and explanations. When something looks interesting, I can deep-dive right from the digest.
emily.author: Emily Thompson
